title: Palm Reading - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/17/18
itunes:title: Palm Reading - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/17/18
description:
Guest host Ian Punnett and palmistry expert Vernon Mahabal explore the science of palm reading, how to find the purpose of life from your hands, and how to know if you are dealing with a disreputable palm reader.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
